no-account-info-dialog.firstParagraph: Singularity is a privately operated online singing game. If you don't have an account for this server, you need to ask the server operator to create one for you. Since the server is private, you need to know the operator for this.
no-account-info-dialog.secondParagraph: If you have the technical expertise, you can run your own Singularity server. Singularity is free and open-source. More information can be found on our Github page.

resetPassword.successMessage: If a user with this email address exists, a password reset link has been sent.

setPassword.invalidLink: The link you have accessed is invalid. Please try again.
setPassword.successMessage: The password has been successfully set!

localSettings.descriptionHTML:
These settings will only be applied in this browser on this computer.
The settings are automatically saved.

menuVolume.description: The audio volume in the menu.

gameVolume.description: The audio volume in the game.

microphoneLatency.description: The microphone latency corresponds to the time from the recording of the singing by the microphone to the display of the data in the game. The latency can depend on the speed of the computer, as well as the microphone used. This value should be set so that no deviation is noticeable in the game. In general, the value should be chosen as small as possible and as large as necessary.

offlineMode.description: In Offline Mode, only downloaded songs will be displayed in the game. This can be helpful in an environment with slow internet or with a metered internet connection.

localStorage.description: Local storage contains all downloaded songs that are available offline without an internet connection. The amount of available storage depends on the browser.

emptyLocalStorage.description: Removes all songs from local storage.

createSongUploadTxtFile.txtFileInfo: The TXT file must be uploaded in UTF-8 format. Otherwise, there may be encoding issues.
createSongUploadTxtFile.downloadable: The audio and video files for this song can be automatically downloaded!

songListItem.downloadedHint: This song is downloaded and available locally without an internet connection.
songListItem.deletePrompt1: Do you really want to delete the song

songList.title: Title
songList.author: Author
songList.serverDownloadsSongs: The server is currently downloading songs. They will be available soon.

autoIndexing.description: Automatically scan your song directory for Ultrastar files and add them to the database.

editUser.resetPasswordPrompt: Do you really want to reset the user's password? An email with further instructions will be sent to the user.

userListItem.deleteUserPrompt1: Do you really want to delete the user

play.downloadedHint: This song is downloaded and available locally without an internet connection.
play.name: Name
play.activeOfflineModeWarning: Offline mode is active. Some songs may not be displayed.

lobby.title: Waiting for Players...
lobby.description: Scan the QR code to join the party. Choose songs and compete against others!

adminFeatureIcon.adminHint: This section is visible only to administrators.

sing.downloadSongsHint: You can download songs in the settings so they don't have to be loaded at the start of the game.
